t: Amazon Trademark Search - Free Tool | SellerApp
s: Enter the search term/ trademark that you are looking to get branded. The Trademark Search picks up all the trademark records associated with that term. Active and inactive. Amazon typically supports Amazon Brand Registered Sellers in case of a listing infringement or hijacker attack.

t: What Is Amazon Brand Gating? (And How to Protect Your Sales With It)
s: What is Amazon brand gating? Brand gating on Amazon prevents counterfeit sellers from selling your product, so you can earn more Amazon sales.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market.
